solution_line_template: Jan was {jan_older_than_cindy} years older than Cindy who was {cindy_age} so {jan_older_than_cindy}+{cindy_age} = <<{jan_older_than_cindy}+{cindy_age}={jan_age}>>{jan_age} years old
Marica was twice as old as Jan so {marcia_times_jan}*{jan_age} = <<{marcia_times_jan}*{jan_age}={marcia_age}>>{marcia_age} years old
Greg was {greg_older_than_marcia} years older than Marcia who was {marcia_age} so {greg_older_than_marcia}+{marcia_age} = <<{greg_older_than_marcia}+{marcia_age}={greg_age}>>{greg_age} years old
